6 contributorsthe end where i begin lyricsverse 1
sometimes tears say all there is to say
sometime your first scars wont ever fade away

chorus
tried to break my heart well its broke

verse 2
sometimes we dont learn from our mistakes
and sometimes weve no choice but to walk away away
